sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Gives Tax Credit Act. References in this Article to "this Act" mean this Article.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Gives Tax Credit Act. References in this Article to "this Act" mean this Article.

sections.heading: Definitions. As used in this Act:
sections.text: Definitions. As used in this Act:

sections.heading: Approval to issue certificates of receipt.
sections.text: Approval to issue certificates of receipt.

sections.heading: Annual report. By March 31, 2026, and by March 31 of each subsequent year, the Department must submit an annual report to the Governor and the General Assembly concerning the activities conducted under this Act during the previous calendar year
sections.text: The report must include a detailed listing of tax cred

sections.heading: Rulemaking. The Department may adopt rules for the implementation of this Act.
sections.text: Rulemaking. The Department may adopt rules for the implementation of this Act.

sections.heading: No acceleration or delay. Where this Act makes changes in a statute that is represented in this Act by text that is not yet or no longer in effect (for example, a Section represented by multiple versions), the use of that text does not accelerate or delay the taking effect of (i) the changes made by
sections.text: No acceleration or delay. Where this Act makes changes in a statute that is represented in this Act by text that is not yet or no longer in effect (for example, a Section represented by multiple versions), the use of that text does not accelerate or delay the taking effect of (i) the changes made by this Act or (ii) provisions derived from any other Public Act.

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law, except that Article 65 takes effect July 1, 2024, Articles 25, 75, 80, 93, 125, 135, and 140 take effect January 1, 2025, and Article 150 takes effect July 1, 2025
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law, except that Article 65 takes effect July 1, 2024, Articles 25, 75, 80, 93, 125, 135, and 140 take effect January 1, 2025, and Article 150 takes effect July 1, 2025.
